prompts.prompt: Do you want to sell your house for $300,000 and start renting a place for $1,200 per month, or keep your house?

owning.prompt: If you didnâ€™t sell your house last year, do you want to sell it now for $320,000 and rent for $1,300 per month, or keep it?

renting.prompt: If renting, do you want to negotiate your rent down by $100 per month, move to a cheaper place, or continue with the current rent?

owning.prompt: If you own a house, do you want to rent out a room for extra income, consider a reverse mortgage, or do nothing?

renting.prompt: If renting, do you want to buy a small condo, continue renting, or move to a different rental property for potential savings?

options.name: Move to a Different Rental Property

owning.prompt: If you own, do you want to sell your house now for a higher market value, rent it out entirely, or continue living in it?

options.name: Sell House for Higher Market Value

renting.prompt: If renting, do you want to downsize further, negotiate a better rent deal, or look for rent-to-own options?

owning.prompt: If owning, do you want to convert part of your house into a rental suite, sell and move to a smaller place, or do nothing?

options.name: Sell and Move to a Smaller Place

renting.prompt: If renting, do you want to relocate to a more affordable city, buy a new home, or continue renting the current property?

options.name: Relocate to a More Affordable City

owning.prompt: If owning, do you want to pay off your mortgage early, rent it out entirely, or consider a home equity line of credit?

options.name: Consider a Home Equity Line of Credit
